markup: <h1><%= title %></h1><p><%= today %><%= day %>.<p><button id="goto"><%= goTo %></button><button id="lang"><%= changeLang %></button>
name: page1

markup: <h1><@= title @></h1><p><% if (0 === (day % 2)) { %><@= even @><% } else { %><@= odd @><% } %><p><button id="goback"><@= goBack @></button><button id="lang"><@= changeLang @></button>
name: page2
